name: 3Ra Rocket Horse
description:
This is the product of my first ever jam, it is a physics based side scrolling platformer.

something I thought I would never be interested in making but it was quite fun! hope you have a laugh and a giggle with some entertaining game play!

Have uploaded the source code as well for anyone to download and look through for education purposes only. this game is 95% generated upon loading the game and for some that my be something they could learn from this little example. 
it is using perlin noise and random generation.
